participant_1.background:

participant_2.background:
I live a very active life, but I always make time for my family.
I love Halloween because it's a time to be creative and have fun.
I am a student who is trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
i like to write my own songs.
I'm insecure about my eating habits.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Hey! It's going great, I'm just taking a break from studying for my midterm. How about yours?
It's going good, I'm just getting ready for work. I work at a museum, designing and testing new environmental technologies.
That sounds like a really interesting job! I'm a student, trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
Oh wow, that's really good of you! I'm sure your baby will be so happy and proud of you.
Thank you, I'm trying my best. I'm also trying to live a more active lifestyle, but it's hard when you're a student and don't have a lot of time.
I know what you mean, I don't have a lot of time to exercise either, but I try to get out for a walk every day.
That's great! I should try to do that more often.
You should! It's a great way to clear your head and de-stress.
Yeah, I know. I'll try to start doing that more often.
No problem, have a good day!
